header.title: Hi
header.description: I specialize in front-end development. I am creative, proactive and committed with a passion for making things beautiful and efficient.

aboutme.description: A self-driven software engineer. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects, as well as collaborate in a team setting. I always give the best of myself in whatever I do.

service-1.title: Dedicated
service-1.description: I give all my effort to surpass my own limits and be the best version of myself I can be

service-2.title: Self-taught
service-2.description: I'm curious and I love investing in my learning, I'm constantly learning new things on my own

service-3.title: Tech Enthusiast
service-3.description: I feel comfortable learning to use new languages or tools to improve my workflow

unet.description: I am currently studying the 7th semester of the computer science engineering degree.

platzi.description: I had the opportunity to be benefited in the 2nd round of the thousand scholarships that were awarded to Venezuelans by platzi in 2019 where I have so far 30 javascript and react courses

udemy.description: I decided to invest in myself, so I have acquired some react and vuejs courses on udemy to be able to expand my knowledge in other javascript frameworks with the aim of becoming a fullstack.

Villartechnologies.description: Be part of the agency that is dedicated to the development of different web applications, be part of the frontend team using some technologies like Angular 8, HTML, CSS JS, Bootstrap and Microservices like Docker.

Freelancer-in-Upwork.description: I worked as a freelance frontend developer using the upwork platform where I had the opportunity to use technologies like ReactJs, Redux, Redux-thunk and template development using HTML, CSS, SCSS, JS.

Zalvadora.description: Frontend developer of zalvadora, a company that is dedicated to training and knowledge management, through its system (LMS + KMS) with multiple comfortable tools.

project-1.description: Tienda para la seleccion de diversas muestras de perfumes para hombre, mujer, unisex

project-2.description: Un crud basico de insignias para los usuarios

project-3.description: Construcción de mano de aterrizaje profesional y optimizada a mano usando React y styled-components

project-4.description: Sitio web usando Vuejs para listar las 20 mejores criptomonedas mas populares en el mercado usando la api de coincap

project-5.description: Un buscador de usuarios usando la api de github
